bug.author: QianSunCN
bug.summary: How to initial weights when training Single Class?
bug.description: Hello, your code is very beautyful. I want to train Single Class, and following the "Example: Train Single Class" , it works. There is one question: How to initial the weights ? Is there some pretrained model for yolov3-spp-1cls.cfg?

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/QianSunCN>@QianSunCN</denchmark-link> you can initialize with random weights, darknet53.conv.74 backbone, or yolov3-spp:
--weights '' --weights weights/darknet53.conv.74 --weights weights/yolov3-spp.pt
